product_name: Planet Bike Air Kiss CO2 Tire Inflator with 16g Cartridge
long_description: The Planet Bike Air Kiss CO2 Tire Inflator offers simple, one-handed operation and includes a 16g C02 cartridge. Includes insulated sleeve to prevent frozen fingers. Fits Presta and Schrader valves without adapters. The Planet Bike Air Kiss CO2 Tire Inflator is compatible with threaded cartridges (cartridges sold separately).
short_description: The Planet Bike Air Kiss CO2 Tire Inflator offers simple, one-handed operation and includes a 16g C02 cartridge.
